item.title: Summer House in the Azores
item.description: The Azores had been a possession of Vekllei since 2002, when they were leased from Portugal indefinitely. The lease was defunct by the time of Veklleiâ€™s independence from U.K. occupation in 2015, and the new state took formal ownership over the small Atlantic islands. The Azores was Veklleiâ€™s resort region, often called simply the â€œholiday islesâ€. Brief reprieves from the North Atlantic cold were granted to hundreds of thousands domestic tourists each year in resorts and holiday rentals alike.
